title: Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) and Teacher Development Programs: Co-Creation-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals (medical/legal/technical) with beginner-level domain expertise in science, provided with digital devices. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply co-creation-based learning design processes for Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL)
Learners can collaboratively develop technology-based educational materials and lesson plans creatively with diverse experts
Learners can apply effective TEL instructional methods to classroom environments through knowledge generation, scaffolding, and adaptive processes

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
